items.raw_string: Name of donor: The Justice Forum, whose members are NAPO, PCS, the Prison Officers Association, the Police Federation, and Simpson Millar Solicitors.Address of donor: 160 Falcon Road, London SW11 2LNAmount of donation or nature and value if donation in kind: Administration and coordination of the Justice Unions and Family Courts Parliamentary Group, a cross-party group which I co-chair, by Union Services Parliamentary Consultancy, at a value of £25,200 from 1 May 2016 until 30 April 2017.Date received: 1 May 2016 until 30 April 2017Date accepted: 1 May 2016Donor status: unincorporated association of trade unions and professionals working in the justice system(Registered 12 May 2016)
